item.title: Pedestrian Crossing Activating When No One is Present, 2nd November
item.description:
The pedestrian crossing is frequently activating on its own, even when there’s no one waiting to cross. The lights change to red and stop traffic unnecessarily, which is causing delays and confusion for drivers and pedestrians alike. It looks like one of the sensors or push buttons may be faulty.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
